      • doRotate

        @NotNull
public static Matrix doRotate(@NotNull
                                        Matrix point,
                                        double angle)
        Uses the 3-shears rotation technique over conventional rotation techniques for improved image quality.
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle by which to rotate point about the global origin (0,0)
        point - the Matrix indicating the point to be rotated
        Returns:
        the rotated point

      • doRotate

        @NotNull
public static Matrix doRotate(@NotNull
                                        Matrix point,
                                        @NotNull
                                        Matrix origin,
                                        double angle)
        Same as doRotate(Matrix, double) above, but does the rotation about the specified origin instead of the global one.
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle by which to rotate point about the given origin
        point - the Matrix indicating the point to be rotated
        origin - the Matrix indicating the origin about which point is to be rotated.
        Returns:
        the rotated point
